root.name: Zombie Tycoon
root.description: Story You play as a mad scientist, who discovers a virus that turned people into controllable zombies. You and your trusty manservant Ernest then administer the virus to as many people as possible and use those zombies to infect even more people.Gameplay You control the zombies trough a interface. You can select groups of zombies and guide them trough a 3d map. You can have them ambush enemies, or just send a load of zombies all in one direction. You can scroll around the 3d map and turn the camera with the analog stick. Development and release The game developed by Frima Studio, and released as a 54mb PSP exclusive title. It was released as a download-only title.
